title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Language Vocational Training Using Collaborative Digital Textbooks (cDTB)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and fundamental language communication skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively create and share professional language materials using the multimodal functions of cDTB (collaborative Digital Textbook).
Learners can complete language projects based on peer feedback through collaborative learning tools.
Learners can self-assess their language proficiency development process through digital portfolios recorded in the cDTB (competency Development Tracking Board).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
